ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | pmmpric.p | |- P = ( Poly1 ` R ) |
| 2 |  | pmmpric.c | |- C = ( N Mat P ) |
| 3 |  | pmmpric.a | |- A = ( N Mat R ) |
| 4 |  | pmmpric.q | |- Q = ( Poly1 ` A ) |
| 5 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( N pMatToMatPoly R ) = ( N pMatToMatPoly R ) |
| 6 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 | #P_pm2mprngiso | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring ) -> ( N pMatToMatPoly R ) e. ( C RingIso Q ) ) |
| 7 |  | #P_ne0i | |- ( ( N pMatToMatPoly R ) e. ( C RingIso Q ) -> ( C RingIso Q ) =/= (/) ) |
| 8 | 6, 7 | #P_syl | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring ) -> ( C RingIso Q ) =/= (/) ) |
| 9 |  | #P_brric | |- ( C ~=r Q <-> ( C RingIso Q ) =/= (/) ) |
| 10 | 8, 9 | #P_sylibr | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring ) -> C ~=r Q ) |
